title: Man holding a banner featuring a cartoon of Mubārak
description: The banner features a political cartoon of Ḥusnī Mubārak trying to hold on to his seat of power while being pulled off. Photographer's description: Pictures taken during the Egyptian Revolution. Text in image: NOW IS NOW - متمسكون بمصالحكم Translation of Text in image: adhered to your position.
name: Mubārak, Muḥammad Ḥusnī, 1928-
subject-lcsh: Caricatures and cartoons; Demonstrations; Egypt; Protest movements
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
source: From: Man holding a banner featuring a cartoon of Mubārak
